content: संनिवेशः {@--1@} Deep entrance into, ardent devotion or attachment, close application. {@--2@} A collection, multitude, assemblage. {@--3@} Union, combination, arrangement; रमणीय एष वः सुमनसां संनिवेशः <ls>Māl. 1. 9.</ls> {@--4@} Site, place, situation, position; <ls>Ku. 7. 25</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 19.</ls> {@--5@} Vicinity, proximity. {@--6@} Form, figure; उद्दामशरीरसंनिवेशः <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; निर्माणसंनिवेशः <ls>K.</ls> {@--7@} A hut, dwelling-place; <ls>R. 14. 76.</ls> {@--8@} Seating in the proper places, giving seats to; क्रियतां समाजसंनिवेशः <ls>U. 7.</ls> {@--9@} Insertion. {@--10@} An open space near a town where people assemble for amusement, exercise &c. {@--11@} The collective position of an asterism.
